name: denshobato
title: denshobato
description: An input form that communicates with the other person on your behalf to avoid garbled characters and input errors when using IME
author: yu_undefined

commands.name: denshobato
commands.title: denshobato
commands.subtitle: Multi-line IME Input
commands.description: The input will be output to the focus and saved to the clipboard.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
